title: Senior Director Brand Communications - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Senior Director Brand Communications Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Execute and/or coordinate the execution of the Global Omni-Channel calendar (including any locally planned and globally approved Market-specific initiatives) with a focus on Wholesale and Own Retail (including Franchise, if applicable)   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
